snippet.title: PROJECT B-FER OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
You and 4 other people are trapped underground on a moving subway train. What are you willing to do to get out? Will you play by the rules, or break them?


WOOHOO its finally here! 
Project B-FER is the result of a week-long, gamejam-style event where myself and other streamers and creators livestreamed the making of a game! This event was planned as a subathon reward back in September of 2022!

The game itself is a biiig love letter to Zero Escape, a game that means a lot to everyone on this team. The game is a visual novel style escape room game with puzzles and branching narrative choices. I'll post the link to the itch page down here once it's live!

EDIT: 
GAME WILL BE LIVE ON SATURDAY 7/22 AT 10:39 PM 
https://streamcope.itch.io/project-b-fer

twitch: https://twitch.tv/casitamono
twitter: https://twitter.com/casitamono
